com.qoppa.pdf.annotations

Class AnnotationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qoppa.pdf.annotations.AnnotationSettings

  • public class AnnotationSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains general Annotation display settings, such as annotation selection stroke and selection color. For jPDFNotes, jPDFEditor: To set default settings for annotation tools such as default color, look under com.qoppa.pdfNotes.settings
    Author:
    Qoppa Software
